name: .FWD File Extension
summary: Learn about .FWD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use an FWD file with the Windows version of RollerCoaster Tycoon 3, place it in the following directory:
Then, open the MixMaster Display tool in RollerCoaster Tycoon 3, select the Open button (which uses a Folder icon), and navigate to and open your FWD file.
